ValidationRule.description: Activity Plan is required to update Status from Define to Design.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Educational_Consultancy', ISCHANGED( Product_Request_Status__c ), ISPICKVAL( PRIORVALUE(Product_Request_Status__c ), 'Define'), ISPICKVAL( Product_Request_Status__c , 'Design'), ISBLANK( Activity_Plan__c ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: “Activity Plan” is required to update the Product Request Status.
